## File Purpose

This file is a **utility or tool script**.

## Original Source

```bash
#!/usr/bin/env bash

TOKEN_FILE=$1
TOKEN_PIPE=$2

rm "${TOKEN_PIPE}" 2>/dev/null ||:
mkfifo "${TOKEN_PIPE}"
cat "${TOKEN_FILE}" > "${TOKEN_PIPE}" &

```
